N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 59-1.10 - Workplace safety and loss prevention consultation

State Regulations
(a) The employer shall undergo a workplace safety and loss prevention consultation
which shall include an analysis of the Workplace Safety and Loss Prevention

Program established for that workplace and an on-site hazard survey of the
entire workplace. (b) Such
consultation shall be performed by a consultant employed by the department or
by a consultant certified by the department. (c) Any costs incurred during the course of
the consultation, such as sampling, laboratory fees and laboratory reports, shall be paid by the employer. Notes
